dimensions: Warp x Weft: 193 x 41 cm (6 ft. 4 in. x 16 1/8 in.)
title: Scarf
medium: Technique: tubular double cloth (two intercrossing plain weave structures); warps widely spaced and wefts overspun resulting in a textured finish.
description: Black and white scarf with identical border at each end with diamonds and small squares and rectangles and a striped field.
name: Scarf
